item.title: 2022 Election Candidate Questionnaire
item.description: Licton Springs Community Council is a non-political organization. We reached out to candidates with a few locally-relevant questions to help our neighbors be better informed about the upcoming election. This information is not an endorsement, and any candidate in a contested race that responded to our questionaire will have their …
